## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked for console errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in multiple browsers (if UI change)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated TypeScript types where applicable

### Security & Compliance
- [ ] My changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have verified that sensitive data is not logged
- [ ] Audit logging is implemented for compliance-critical actions (if applicable)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have run `npm audit` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have not introduced unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] All dependencies are properly versioned
